articles.author: CNA
articles.title: AirAsia Indonesia to stop flights for a month from July 6 - CNA
articles.description: The Indonesian unit of AirAsia Group Bhd will temporarily stop all flights for a month from July 6 to support the government's effort to limit a spike in COVID-19 cases, the company said on Saturday.
